synopsis.text:
Stars from 11 Pretty Cure anime series unite in the sixth Pretty Cure All Stars crossover movie, Pretty Cure All Stars New Stage 3: Eien no Tomodachi, to protect the world of children's dreams from a looming threat. The HappinessCharge PreCure team, led by Lovely and Princess, takes center stage when fairies-in-training En'en and Gureru seek their help. The team discovers that a tapir fairy is keeping children trapped in their dreams, including Megumi, to give her son an eternal companionship.

As the other PreCure teams fall victim to the tapir fairy's trap, they become ensnared in their own happy dreams, leaving only the HappinessCharge team to confront this powerful enemy. With the stakes high and the dream world in chaos, the HappinessCharge team must defeat the nightmares, rescue their fellow PreCure teams, and save the children from a life of endless slumber. Can they restore balance to the dream world and prove that friendship lasts forever? Join the Pretty Cure All Stars in this thrilling adventure to find out!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
